name: dillon-drenzek-com
description: The Portfolio Website of Dillon Drenzek, built with Angular
author: Dillon Drenzek <dillon@drenzek.com>

scripts.start: npm install && npm run build:css && npm run serve
scripts.build:css: npm run build:scss && npm run build:bootstrap
scripts.build:bootstrap: npm run compile:bootstrap && npm run postcss && npm run minify:bootstrap
scripts.compile:bootstrap: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 src/style/bootstrap/bootstrap.scss static/style/bootstrap/bootstrap.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 src/style/bootstrap/bootstrap-grid.scss static/style/bootstrap/bootstrap-grid.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 src/style/bootstrap/bootstrap-reboot.scss static/style/bootstrap/bootstrap-reboot.css
scripts.minify:bootstrap: cleancss --skip-advanced --source-map --output static/style/bootstrap/bootstrap.min.css static/style/bootstrap/bootstrap.css && cleancss --skip-advanced --source-map --output static/style/bootstrap/bootstrap-grid.min.css static/style/bootstrap/bootstrap-grid.css && cleancss --skip-advanced --source-map --output static/style/bootstrap/bootstrap-reboot.min.css static/style/bootstrap/bootstrap-reboot.css
